name: Crazy's Nightmare
description:
Hello. It's Aimee Harper, I am a solo female developer. Crazy’s Nightmare was inspired by one of my favourite series, Orange is The New Black. It’s now available to buy! 

Crazy’s Nightmare is a 2D Top Down action survival game based on a nightmare. Defeat the different enemies by becoming the main character 'Crazy' and win the ultimate Boss battle at the end to wake up from the nightmare.

Any support and feedback will be gratefully received.

Features

GamePlay

  • Waves  : Battle through and survive waves of enemies.
  • Boss Battle  : Ultimate Boss Battle, is you can survive the waves.
  • Weapons. : Unique to the character weapons, that you are sure to have fun with

Art, Graphic

  • Unique art : Using inspiration from artist and comedian Doogie Horner. 
  • Animation  : All Character drawn by hand 2D frame by frame animation.
